comments.content: Is there an alternate uc U for Perpetua since this doesn’t match?
The italic cap R isn’t the same either. Still, thanks for the ID!

It looks like Yves has already credited this as solved, but Perpetua isn’t quite right. Howzabout another Gill design - [Golden Cockerel Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20071012080718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-golden-cockerel/golden-cockerel-titling-itc/testdrive.html)?

Here’s the [Fontshop offering](http://web.archive.org/web/20071012080718/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=ITC.100487.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=32&sampleText=AMERICAN+RPUBL&sampleSize=32) with preview. And the [italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071012080718/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=ITC.100487.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=32&sampleText=OREST+BROWN&sampleSize=24).
Yep - Dave Fairey’s cut of Eric Gill’s Golden Cockerel for ITC.
